column2: Shared data with locality achieved through Data Islands.
Coordination through reliable distributed COTS database. (Externalize state from controller components)
Single data island for each execution engine.
Data Island implements file system interface including QoS allowing implementation to change.
Limited coupling between Service Pillar and Processing Pillar.
Processing Pillar layered to be modifiable and reflect astronomy pipelines and rate of change of implementations and services
Loose coupling to allow degraded operation and improve buildability
Layering encourages separatiion of skills - astromical, HPC, Platforms and algorithms
Two-tiered model for execution engines improves scalability
